original_title: Because We're Being Spies Right Now
overview: Agents Donald Zbornak and Blake Devereaux are tasked with a dangerous mission. When Zbornak is captured and interrogated by a Russian arms dealer, Devereaux sets out on a rough-and-tumble mission to save his partner at all costs... whether Zbornak likes it or not. This larger-than-life short comedy explores the meaning of true friendship, and why we continue to love the people who drive us mad.
title: Because We're Being Spies Right Now
